Translations.Text: Ani jyanna amacya bhetici asa nahi, te mhanale ki amacyavara phariste ka nahi avatarita kele jata? Kinva amhi (apalya dolyanni) apalya palanakartyasa pahile asate? Tya lokanni svatah apalyalaca khupa mothe samajuna ghetale ahe ani phara avajna keli ahe
Jya divasi he pharistyanna pahatila tya divasi ya aparadhyankarita konatahi ananda nasela ani mhanatila ki vancitaca vancita thevale gelo
Ani tyanni je je karma kele hote amhi tyancyakade pudhe ho'una tyanna kanampramane ksata-viksata karuna takale
(Parantu) tya divasi jannatamadhye rahanaryance thikana phara cangale asela, ani visramasthanahi sukhadayaka asela
Ani jya divasi akasa dhagansaha phatuna ja'ila ani phariste satata utaravile jatila
Tya divasi yogyaritya rajyasatta kevala rahamanacica(krpalu) asela, ani ha divasa kaphirankarita motha sakta asela
Ani tya divasi atyacari, apalya hatanna cava ghe'una mhanela, arere! Mi paigambaraca marga angikarala asata tara bare jhale asate
Arere! Mi amuka eka isamala mitra banavile nasate tara bare jhale asate
Tyane tara mala tyanantara margabhrasta kele, jevha upadesa majhyajavala ye'una pohocala hota ani saitana tara manavala (velevara) daga denara ahe
Ani paigambara mhanela ki he majhya palanakartya! Nihsansaya, majhya janasamuhane ya kura'anasa soduna dile hote
Ani asa prakare amhi kahi aparadhyanna pratyeka paigambarance satru banavile ahe ani tumaca palanakartaca margadarsana karanara ani madata karanara puresa ahe

Ani kaphira mhanale ki tyacyavara sampurna kura'ana ekaca veli ka nahi avatarita kele gele? Asa prakare (amhi thode thode karuna avatarita kele) yasathi ki yadva'are amhi tumacya hrdayasa majabuti pradana karavi. Ani amhi tyasa thambuna thambunaca vacuna aikavile ahe
Ani he tumacyajavala je kahi udaharana ghe'una yetila amhi tyace khare uttara ani yogya spastikarana sangu
Je loka tondaghasi paduna jahannamakade ekatra kele jatila, tara teca mothya va'ita thikanace ani bhrasta margace aheta
Ani nihsansaya, amhi musala grantha pradana kela ani tyancyasobata tyanca bha'u harunala tyanca sahayyaka banavile
Ani sangitale ki tumhi doghe tya lokankade ja, je amacya nisanyanna khote tharavita aheta. Maga amhi tyanca agadi sarvanasa kela

Ani nuhacya janasamuhanehi jevha paigambaranna khote tharavile, tevha amhi tyanna budavuna takale ani lokankarita tyanna bodhapraptice cinha banavile ani amhi atyacarinkarita mothi kathora siksa tayara karuna thevali ahe
Ani ‘ada’ janasamuha ani ‘samuda’ janasamuha ani vihiravalyanna ani tyancya daramyanacya aneka sampradayanna nasta karuna takale
Ani amhi pratyekasamora udaharane prastuta keli, maga pratyekala purnatah nasta kele

Ani he loka tya vastijavalunahi ye-ja karatata, jicyavara motha va'ita prakaraca pa'usa padala gela.1 Kaya he tarihi te pahata nahita? Khari gosta asi ki tyanna melyanantara dusaryanda jivanta ho'una ubhe rahanyavara visvasaca nahi
Ani tumhala jevha kadhi pahatata, tevha tumaci thatta udavu lagatata, haca kaya to manusa jyala allahane rasula banavuna pathavila ahe

(Evadhe bare) ki amhi atala rahilo, an'yatha yane tara amhala amacya aradhya daivatampasuna vicalita karanyata kahica kasara sodali navhati. Ani jevha he (allahacya) siksa- yatananna pahatila tevha tyanna spastatah kaluna ye'ila ki purnapane margapasuna bhatakalela kona hota
Kaya tumhi tyalahi pahile jyane apalya iccha-akanksanna devata (upasya) banavuna thevale ahe. Kaya tumhi tyaci jababadari ghe'u sakata
Kaya tumhi yaca vicarata ahata ki tyancyapaiki bahuteka jana aikatata kinva samajatata. Te tara agadi janavaransarakhe aheta, kimbahuna tyancyapeksahi adhika vata cukalele
Kaya tumhi nahi pahile ki tumacya palanakartyane savalila kasa prakare vistrta kele ahe. Tyane icchile asate tara tila sthira kele asate, maga suryala amhi tyavara pramana tharavile
Maga amhi tyala halu halu apalyakade odhuna ghetale
Ani toca ahe, jyane ratrila tumacyasathi posakha banavile, ani jhopela sukha santimaya banavile ani divasala uthuna ubhe rahanyaci vela
Ani toca ahe jo krpasvarupa pavasapurvi khusakhabara denarya havela pathavito ani amhi akasatuna atisaya svaccha- sud'dha (paka) pani varsavito
Yasathi ki tyacyadvare mrta jhalelya saharala jivanta karave ani te amhi apalya nirmitipaiki adhikansa janavaranna ani manasanna pajato
Ani nihsansaya, amhi yasa tyancya daramyana aneka prakare varnana kele yasathi ki tyanni bodha prapta karava, parantu tarihi adhikansa lokanni krtaghnatekherija (anakhi kahi) manale nahi
Ani amhi jara icchile asate tara pratyeka vastita eka bhaya dakhavinara pathavila asata
Tevha tumhi kaphirance mhanane man'ya karu naka ani kura'anadvare purna saktine tyancyasi mahadharmayud'dha (jihada) kara
Ani toca ahe jyane dona samudranna apasata milavuna thevale ahe. Eka ahe goda cavadara ani dusara khara kadu ani ani ya doghancya daramyana eka ada padada ani bhakkama ada ubha kela

Ani toca ahe jyane panyapasuna manavala nirmana kele, maga tyala vansa balaganara ani sasaravadice natesambandha rakhanara banavile. Nihsansaya, tumaca palanakarta pratyeka gosta karanyasa samartha ahe
Ani he allaha'aivaji asanci upasana karatata je na tyanna kahi labha pohacavu sakatata ani na kahi hani pohacavu sakatata. Kaphira tara aheca apalya palanakartyavirud'dha (saitana) ca sahayyaka
Ani amhi tumhala khusakhabara denara ani khabaradara karanara (paigambara) banavuna pathavile ahe
Sanga ki mi (kura'ana pohacavilyabaddala) tumacyakaduna kasalehi parisramika icchita nahi, parantu he ki jo icchila tyane apalya palanakartyaca marga angikarava

Ani tya cirakala rahanarya allahavara purna visvasa rakhava, jyala kadhihi mrtyu nahi tyacya prasansesaha tyaci pavitrata (tasbiha) varnana karita rahave. To apalya dasance aparadha cangalya prakare janato

Toca ahe jyane akasanna ani jaminila ani tyancya daramyana asalelya samasta vastunna saha divasanta nirmana kele, maga to arsa (isa-sinhasana) vara bulanda jhala. To rahamana ahe, tumhi tyacyavisayi ekhadya janakarala vicara

Ani tyanna jevha dekhila sangitale jate ki rahamana (dayavana allaha) la sajada kara (tyacyapudhe matha teka) tevha te mhanatata ki rahamana kaya ahe? Kaya amhi tyala sajada karava, jyaca adesa tumhi amhala deta ahata ani (ya avahanane) tyancya tiraskarata vadhaca hote
Motha subha- mangalaprada ahe to jyane akasata buruja banavile, ani tyata surya banavila ani prakasamana candra dekhila
Ani tyaneca ratra ani divasala eka pathopatha ye-ja karanara banavile tya manasacya bodha- upadesakarita, jo bodha prapta karanyaca kinva krtajnasila honyaca irada rakhata asela
Ani rahamana (dayavana allaha) ce sacce dasa te aheta, je jaminivara naramine calatata ani jevha ajnani loka tyancyasi bolu lagatata, tevha te mhanatata salama ahe
Ani je apalya palanakartyasamora sajada karatata ani ubhe rahuna (namajacya avastheta) ratra ghalavitata
Ani je du'a (prarthana) karatata ki he amacya palanakartya! Jahannamacya siksa- yatanela amacyapasuna duraca theva, karana tici siksa agadi cikatuna rahanari ahe
Te kayamasvarupi thikana ani nivasacya drstine mothi va'ita jaga ahe
Ani je kharca karatanahi na udhalapatti karatata, na kanjusapana, kimbahuna ya doghammadhila samatola marga asato

Ani je allahasobata dusarya ekhadya upasyala pukarata nahi, ani ekhadya asa manasala, jyaci hatya karane allahane harama (avaidha) kele asave, tyaci nahaka hatya karita nahi, na te vyabhicara karatata1 ani jo koni he karma karila tara to svatahvara kathora siksa odhavuna ghe'ila
Tyala kayamatacya divasi duppata azaba (siksa- yatana) dila ja'ila ani to apamana ani anadarasaha sadaiva tetheca rahila
Tya lokankherija, je maphi magatila ani imana rakhatila ani nekice karma karatila tara asa lokance aparadha, allaha satkamarmata badalato. Allaha motha mapha karanara ani daya karanara ahe
Ani jo manusya maphi magela ani satkarma karata rahila tara to vastavikapane allahakade khara jhukava rakhato
Ani je khoti saksa deta nahita, ani jevha te ekhadya nirarthaka ani vyartha gostijavaluna jatata, tevha pratisthapurvaka jatata
Ani jevha tyanna tyancya palanakartya (ci vacane ani vayadyansambandhi) cya ayati aikavilya jatata tevha te tyavara andhale-bahire ho'una udi gheta nahita
Ani asi du'a (prarthana) karatata ki he amacya palanakartya! Tu amhala amacya patn'ya ani santatidvare netranna sitalata pradana kara ani amhala neka- sadacari lokanca neta banava
Heca te loka hota, jyanna tyancya sahanasilatecya mobadalyata (jannatace unca) sajje pradana kele jatila, tithe tyanna asirvada ani salama pohacavila ja'ila
Tithe te nehami nehami rahatila, ti atisaya cangali jaga ani aramace thikana ahe
Sanga, jara tumaci mrdu- komala du'a (prarthana) nasati, tara majhya palanakartyane tumaci kadapi parva keli nasati. Tumhi tara khote tharavile ahe. Ata lavakaraca tyaci siksa tumhala ye'una dharela
Ta - sina - mima
Ya divya granthacya ayati aheta
Tyanni imana na rakhalyabaddala kadacita tumhi apala jiva sodala
Jara amhi icchile asate tara tyancyavara akasatuna ekhadi asi nisani avatarita keli asati ki jicyasamora tyancya mana jhukalya asatya
Ani tyancyajavala rahamana (dayavana allaha) kaduna je dekhila nave bodha- upadesa ale, tyakaduna tonda phiravinare banale
Tya lokanni khote tharavile ahe, ata lavakaraca tyancyajavala, tya gostici varta ye'una pohacela, jici te thatta udavita aheta
Kaya tyanni jaminikade nahi pahile ki amhi ticyata pratyeka prakaracya sundara jodya kititari ugavilya aheta
Nihsansaya tyata mothi nisani ahe, tathapi tyancyapaiki bahuteka loka imana rakhanara nahita
Ani nihsansaya tumaca palanakarta varcasvasali ani dayavana ahe
Ani jevha tumacya palanakartyane musala pukarale ki tu atyacari janasamuhajavala ja
Phira'aunacya janasamuhajavala. Kaya te sadacarana karanara nahita
Musa mhanale, he majhya palanakartya! Mala tara bhaya vatate ki kadacita tyanni mala khote (na) tharavave
Ani majhi chati (hrdaya) sankucita hota ahe. Majhi jibha valata nahi yastava tu harunakad'ehi vahayi (prakasana) pathava
Ani tyanca majhyavara, majhya eka cukica (dava) hi ahe. Mala bhaya vatate ki kadacita tyanni majhi hatya na karuna takavi
(Allahane) pharmavile, ase kadapi honara nahi. Thumhi doghe amacya nisanyansaha ja. Amhi svatah aikanare tumacya sobatila ahota
Tumhi doghe phira'aunajavala ja'una sanga ki nihsansaya amhi sarya jagacya palanakartyatarphe pathavilele ahota
Ki tu amacyasobata isra'ilacya santatila pathava
(Phira'auna) mhanala, kaya amhi tujhe, tujhya balapanata apalya yethe palanaposana kele navhate? Ani tu apalya vayaci (ayusyaci) aneka varse amacyata nahi kadhalita
Ani nantara tu je apale kama kele te kele ani tu krtaghna lokampaiki ahesa
(Musa) mhanale, mi he kama asa veli kele jevha mi vata cukalelya lokampaiki hoto
Nantara mi tumacya dahasatimule tumacyapasuna palalo, maga mala majhya palanakartyane adesa va jnana pradana kele ani mala apalya paigambarampaiki kele
Ani kaya majhyavara tujha haca to upakara ahe? Jo tu jahira karita ahesa ki tu isra'ilacya santatila gulama banavuna thevale ahe
Phira'auna mhanala ki sarva visvanca svami va palanakarta kaya ahe
(Hajarata musa) mhanale, to akasanca ani dharatica ani tyancya daramyanacya samasta vastunca svami va palanakarta ahe, jara tumhi imana rakhanare asala
(Phira'auna) apalya nikatacya lokanna mhanala, kaya tumhi aikata nahi
(Hajarata musa) mhanale, to tumaca ani tumacya purvajancahi svami va palanakarta ahe
(Phira'auna) mhanala, (lokanno) tumaca ha paigambara, jo tumacyakade pathavila gela ahe, ha tara agadica veda ahe
(Hajarata musa) mhanale, toca purva ani pascimeca ani tyacya daramyana asalelya samasta vastunca palanakarta ahe, jara tumhi akkala balagata asala
(Phira'auna) mhanala, khabaradara jara tu majhyasivaya dusarya konala upasya banavile tara mi tula kaida karuna takina
(Musa) mhanale, mi tujhyajavala ekhadi spasta vastu ghe'una alyavarahi
(Phira'auna) mhanala, jara tu sacca lokampaiki ahesa tara ti sadara kara
Tyanni (tyaca veli) apali kathi khali takali ti acanaka ughada ughada (phara motha) ajagara banali
Ani apala hata bahera kadhala tara to dekhila tyaca ksani pahanaryanna subhra prakasamaya disu lagala
(Phira'auna) apalya javalacya saradaranna mhanu lagala ki ha tara phara motha nisnata jadugara ahe
Ha tara ase icchito ki apalya jaducya joravara tumhala tumacya bhumituna bahera kadhave. Sanga, ata tumhi kaya salla deta
Te sarva mhanale, tumhi yala ani yacya bhavala savada dya ani sarva saharammadhye (lokanna) ekatra karanare pathava
Jyanni tumacyajavala nisnata jadugaranna ghe'una yave
Maga eka nirdharita divasacya veli sarva jadugara ekatrita kele gele
Ani sarvasaman'ya lokannahi sangitale gele ki tumhi dekhila jama vhala
Yasathi ki jara jadugara prabhavi tharale tara amhi tyanceca anusarana karu
Jadugara ye'una phira'aunala mhanu lagale ki jara amhi jinkalo tara amhala kahi baksisa vagaire milela na
(Phira'auna) mhanala, hoya! (Mothya khusine) kimbahuna asa paristhitita tumhi majhe khasa darabari vhala
(Hajarata) musa jadugaranna mhanale, je kaya tumhala takayace ahe, te taka
Tyanni apalya dorya ani kathya khali takalya ani mhanale, phira'aunacya pratistheci sapatha, amhi avasya vijayi ho'u
Ata (hajarata) musa yannihi apali kathi khali takali, jine tyaca ksani tyanca asatyaca banavilela khela gilayala suruvata keli
He pahataca te jadugara sajadyata padale
Ani tyanni spastapane sangitale ki amhi tara sarva visvacya palanakartyavara imana rakhale
Arthata musa ani harunacya palanakartyavara

(Phira'auna) mhanala, majhi paravanagi ghenyapurvica tumhi tyacyavara imana rakhale, niscitaca ha tumaca saradara (motha guru) ahe, jyane tumha sarvanna jadu sikavali ahe. Tevha tumhala attaca mahita padela. Sapatha ahe. Mi dekhila tumace hata paya virud'dha disanni kapuna takina ani tumha sarvanna phasavara latakavina
Te mhanale, kahi harakata nahi, amhi tara apalya palanakartyakade paratuna janaraca ahota
Ya karanastava ki amhi sarvanta prathama imana rakhanare banalo ahota, amhi asa balagato ki amaca svami va palanakarta amacya sarva cuka mapha karila
Ani amhi musavara vahayi (prakasana) keli ki ratricya ratri majhya dasanna ghe'una nigha. Tumha sarvanca pathalaga kela ja'ila
Phira'aunane saharammadhye jama karanaryanna pathavile
Ki niscitaca ha samuha atisaya kami sankhyeta ahe
Ani tyavara he amhala phara krodhita karita aheta
Ani nihsansaya, amhi mothya sankhyeta ahota, tyancyapasuna savadha rahanare
Sevati amhi tyanna bagammadhuna va jharyammadhuna bahera kadhale
Ani khajin'yammadhuna ani cangalya cangalya thikanammadhuna
Asa prakare jhale, ani amhi tya (sarva vastum) ca varasa isra'ilacya santatila banavile
Yastava phira'aunace anuyayi surya ugavataca tyanca pathalaga karanyasa nighale
Yasathi jevha doghanni ekamekanna pahile tevha musace sathidara mhanale, amhi tara khatrine pakadita alo
(Hajarata musa) mhanale, kadapi nahi. Visvasa rakha, majha raba (palanakarta) majhya sobatila ahe. Jo jarura mala marga dakhavila
Amhi musakade vahayi (prakasana) pathavili ki samudracya panyavara apalya kathica prahara kara tevha tyaca ksani samudra dubhangala ani pratyeka his'sa panyacya mothya parvata'itaka jhala
Ani amhi tyaca thikani dusaryanna javala anuna ubhe kele
Ani musa ani tyancya sarva sathidaranna mukti pradana keli
Maga itara sarvanna budavuna takale
Nihsansaya, yata phara motha bodha ahe ani tyancyapaiki adhikansa loka imana rakhanare nahita
Ani nihsansaya tumaca palanakarta motha varcasvasali ani daya karanara ahe
Ani tyanna ibrahimaca vrttantahi aikava
Jevha tyanni apalya pityasa ani apalya janasamuhacya lokanna pharmavile ki tumhi konaci upasana karata
Tyanni uttara dile ki amhi murtinci upasana karato. Amhi tara satata tyance upasaka banuna basalo ahota
Paigambara (ibrahima alai.) Yanni vicarale, jevha tumhi yanna pukarata tevha kaya te aikatatahi
Kinva tumhala napha - nukasanahi pohacavu sakatata
Te mhanale, he (sarva amhi nahi janata) amhala tara amace purvaja aseca karatana adhalale aheta
(Ibrahima) mhanale, tyanna kahi janata, jyanci tumhi puja karita ahata
Tumhi ani tumacya purvice vadavadila
Te sarva majhe satru aheta, tya sacca allahakherija, jo sarva visvaca palanakarta ahe
Jyane mala nirmana kele ani toca mala margadarsana karato
Toca ahe jo mala kha'u-pi'u ghalato
Taseca jevha mi ajari padato tevha to mala svasthya pradana karato
Ani toca mala mrtyu de'ila ani maga punha jivanta karila
Ani jyacyakaduna asa balagato ki to mobadala dila janyacya divasi majhe aparadha mapha karila
He majhya palanakartya! Mala hikamata (bud'dhi kausalya) pradana kara ani mala neka- sadacari lokammadhye samila kara
Ani majhe pavitra - smarana (bhavisyata) yenarya lokammadhyehi baki theva
Ani mala sukhanni bharalelya jannatacya varasampaiki banava
Ani majhya pityasa ksama kara. Nihsansaya to margabhrasta lokampaiki hota
Ani jya divasi loka dusaryanda jivanta kele jatila, mala apamanita karu nakosa
Jya divasi dhana-sampatti ani santati kahica upayogi padanara nahi
Parantu (labhanvita toca tharela) jo allahasamora vyangavirahita hrdaya ne'ila
Ani neka sadacari lokankarita jannatala agadi javala anale ja'ila
Ani margabhrasta lokankarita jahannama ughada keli ja'ila
Ani tyanna vicarale ja'ila ki tumhi jyanci upasana karita rahile, te kothe aheta
Je sarvasrestha allahakherijace hote. Kaya he tumaci madata karatata kinva ekhada badala ghe'u sakatata
Yastava te sarva ani samasta margabhrasta loka jahannamamadhye vara khali phekale jatila
Ani iblisa (saitana) ce sampurna sain'yahi
Tithe te apasata bhandana - tanta karita mhanatila
Allahaci sapatha! Nihsansaya, amhi tara ughata asa cukinvara hoto
Vastavika tumhala sarva visvacya palanakartyasamana samajata hoto
Ani amhala tara gunhegarankherija itara konihi margabhrasta kele navhate
Ata tara amaci koni sipharasa karanarahi nahi
Ani na ekhada (sacca) hitacintaka mitra
Jara amhala eka vela dusaryanda janyaci sandhi labhali asati tara amhi pakke sacce imanadharaka banalo asato
Nihsansaya, yata eka phara mothi nisani ahe, parantu tyancyapaiki bahuteka loka imana rakhanare nahita
Ani nihsansaya, tumaca palanakartaca varcasvasali, dayavana ahe
Nuhacya janasamuhanehi paigambaranna khote tharavile
Jevha tyanca bha'u nuha yanni sangitale, kaya tumhi allahace bhaya nahi rakhata
(Aika!) Mi tumacyakade allahaca visvasta rasula (paigambara) ahe
Tevha tumhi allahace bhaya balagale pahije ani majhe mhanane man'ya kele pahije
Ani mi tumacyakaduna tyabaddala konatahi mobadala icchita nahi. Majha mobadala tara kevala sarva visvanca palanakartyajavala ahe
Yastava tumhi allahace bhaya rakha ani majhe ajnapalana kara
(Janasamuhane) uttara dile ki kaya amhi tumacyavara imana rakhave? Tumace ajnapalana karanare tara halakya pratice loka aheta
(Nuha) mhanale, mala kaya mahita ki purvi te kaya karita rahileta
Tyancya hisobaci jababadari tara majhya palanakartyavara ahe. Jara samaja balagata asala
Ani mi imana rakhanaryanna dhakke denara (jhidakaranara) nahi
Mi tara spastatah khabaradara karanara ahe
Te mhanale, he nuha! Jara tu he thambavale nahisa tara avasya tula dagadanca mara karuna thara kele ja'ila
(Nuha) mhanale, he majhya palanakartya! Majhya janasamuhacya lokanni mala khote tharavile
Tevha tu, majhya ani tyancya daramyana niscitaca phaisala kara, ani mala va majhya imanadharaka sathidaranna mukti pradana kara
Yastava amhi tyala ani tyacya sathidaranna bharalelya nauketa (svara karuna) sutaka pradana keli
Maga tyanantara bakicya sarva lokanna amhi budavuna takale
Nihsansaya, yata motha bodha ahe parantu tyancyapaiki bahusankhya loka imana rakhanare navhateca
Ani nihsansaya, tumaca palanakarta motha prabhavasali, dayavana ahe
Ada (janasamuha) nehi paigambaranna khote tharavile
Jevha tyanna tyaca bha'u hudane sangitale, kaya tumhi allahace bhaya nahi rakhata
Mi tumaca visvasta paigambara (sandesavahaka) ahe
Tevha allahace bhaya rakha ani majhe mhanane man'ya kara
Ani mi tyabaddala tumacyakaduna kasalahi mobadala magata nahi, majhe parisramika (mobadala) tara sarva visvancya palanakartyajavala ahe
Kaya tumhi pratyeka unca sthanavara khelasvarupa karamanukice cinha (smaraka) banavita ahata
Ani mothya udyogace (majabuta mahala nirmana) karita ahata, janu kahi tumhi sadaivakala itheca rahala
Ani jevha ekhadyavara hata takata, tevha mothya kathorapane pakadata
Tevha allahace bhaya rakha ani majhe mhanane man'ya kara
Ani tyace bhaya balaga, jyane tya gostidvare tumaci madata keli, jyanna tumhi janata
Tyane tumaci madata keli sampatti ani santatidvare
Ani baga ani jharyandvare
Mala tara tumacyababata mothya divasacya siksa- yatanece bhaya vatate
(Te) mhanale ki tumhi upadesa kara kinva upadesa karanaryampaiki rahu naka amacyakarita sarakheca ahe
Ha tara pracina kalacya lokanca dina (dharma) ahe
Ani amhi kadapi siksa- yatana prapta karanaryampaiki asanara nahi

Jya'arthi ‘ada’ janasamuhacya lokanni (hajarata) huda yanna khote tharavile yasathi amhi tyanna nasta kele. Nihsansaya, yata mothi nisani ahe, parantu tyancyapaiki bahuteka loka imana rakhanare navhate
Ani nihsansaya tumaca palanakartaca varcasvasali, dayavana ahe
‘Samuda’ samudayacya lokannihi paigambarasa khote tharavile
Jevha tyance bandhu ‘svaleha’ne tyanna sangitale ki kaya tumhi allahace bhaya balagata nahi
Mi tumacyakade allahaca visvasta paigambara ahe
Tevha tumhi allahace bhaya rakha ani majhe ajnapalana kara
Ani mi tyabaddala tumacyakaduna kasalahi mobadala magata nahi. Majha mobadala tara sarva visvancya palanakartyakade ahe
Kaya vastum (denagyam) madhye, jya ithe aheta, tumhala santipurvaka sodale ja'ila
Arthata tya bagammadhye ani tya jharyammadhye
Ani tya setammadhye ani tya khajurincya bagammadhye jyance ghosa (bhara vadhalyane) tutuna padatata
Ani tumhi parvatanna koruna akarsaka (sundara) imarati nirmana karata
Yastava allahace bhaya rakha ani majhe anusarana kara
Ani maryadece ullanghana karanaryance anusarana karanyapasuna thamba
Je dharatita phasada (utpata) pasaravita aheta ani sudharana karita nahi
Te mhanale, tu tara asa lokampaiki ahesa, jyancyavara jadutona kela gela ahe
Tu tara amacyasarakhaca eka manusya ahe. Jara tu sacca lokampaiki ahesa tara ekhada mojija (isacamatkara) ghe'una ye
(Svaleha) mhanale, hi sandani ahe. Pani pyayaci eka pali hici, ani eka nirdharita divasi pani pinyaci pali tumaci
(Ani khabaradara!) Hila va'ita hetune hata lavu naka, an'yatha eka mothya divasaci siksa- yatana tumhala ye'una dharela
Tarihi tyanni tice hata paya kapuna takale, nantara pascattapa karanare jhale
Tevha azaba (allahacya siksa- yatane) ne tyanna ye'una dharale. Nihsansaya, yata mothi sikavana (bodha) ahe, parantu tyancyapaiki bahusankhya loka imana rakhanare navhate
Ani nihsansaya tumaca palanakarta motha prabhavasali, dayavana ahe
Lutacya janasamuhanehi paigambaranna khote tharavile
Jevha tyanca bha'u luta yanni tyanna sangitale ki kaya tumhi allahace bhaya nahi balagata
Mi tumacyakade visvasta rasula (paigambara) ahe
Tevha tumhi allahace bhaya rakha ani majhe ajnapalana kara
Ani mi tumacyakaduna yabaddala konatahi mobadala magata nahi, majhya mobadalyaci jababadari kevala sarva visvancya palanakartyavara ahe
Kaya tumhi jagatalya lokampaiki purusanjavala jata
Ani tumacya jya striyanna allahane tumaci patni banavile ahe tyanna soduna deta, khari gosta asi ki tumhi ahataca maryada olandanare
(Tyanna) uttara dile ki he luta! Jara tu he thambavale nahisa tara avasya tula bahera kadhale ja'ila
(Luta) mhanale, mi tumacya acaranane agadi aprasanna ahe
He majhya palanakartya! Mala ani majhya kutumbala ya (kukarma) pasuna vacava, je he karita aheta
Yastava amhi tyanna ani tyancyasi sambandha (nate) asalelya sarvanna vacavile
Eka vrd'dha strikherija ki ti mage rahanaryampaiki jhali
Maga amhi itara sarvanna nasta karuna takale
Ani amhi tyancyavara eka khasa prakaraca pa'usa padala. To motha va'ita pa'usa hota, jo khabaradara kelya gelelya lokanvara padala
Nihsansaya, yatahi mothi nisani ahe, parantu tyancyapaiki adhikansa loka imana rakhanare navhate
Nihsansaya, tumaca palanakartaca varcasvasali, daya karanara ahe
Eyakavalyannihi paigambaranna khote tharavile
Jevha (paigambara) su'aiba tyanna mhanale, kaya tumhi allahace bhaya nahi rakhata
Mi tumacyakade visvasta paigambara ahe
Tevha tumhi allahace bhaya rakha, ani majhe ajnapalana kara
Ani mi tyabaddala tumacyakaduna kasalyahi mobadalyaci apeksa karita nahi. Majhya mobadalyaci jababadari tara sarva visvancya palanakartyara ahe
Mapa - tola purepura kara ani kami denaryammadhye samila ho'u naka
Ani sarala (ucita) tarajune tola karuna dya
Ani lokanna tyancya vastu kami karuna de'u naka ani (nirbhaya ho'una) dharativara utpata (phasada) majavita phiru naka
Ani tya allahace bhaya rakha, jyane svatah tumhala ani purvicya nirmitila nirmana kele
(Te) mhanale, tu tara tya lokampaiki ahesa, jyancyavara jadutona kela jato
Ani tu tara amacyasarakhaca eka manusya ahe ani amhi tara tula khote bolanaryampaikica samajato
Jara tumhi sacca lokampaiki asala tara amacyavara akasaca ekhada tukada kosalava
Paigambara mhanale ki majha palanakarta cangalya prakare jananara ahe, je kahi tumhi karita ahata
Yastava tyanni tyala khote tharavile, tevha tyanna savalivalya divasacya azaba (siksa- yatane) ne dharale. To mothya bhayankara divasaca azaba hota
Nihsansaya, tyata mothi nisani ahe, parantu tyancyapaiki bahusankhya loka imana rakhanare navhate
Ani nihsansaya, tumaca palanakartaca varcasvasali, dayavana ahe
Ani nihsansaya ha (kura'ana) sarva visvancya palanakartyane avatarita kela ahe
Yasa visvasta pharista (jibrila) ghe'una ala ahe
Tumacya hrdayavara (avatarala ahe) yasathi ki tumhi (lokanna) khabaradara karanaryampaiki vhave
Spasta arabi bhaseta ahe
Ani purvi ho'una gelelya paigambarancya granthammadhyehi ya (kura'ana) ci carca ahe
Kaya tyancyasathi hi nisani puresi nahi ki (kura'anacya satyatela) isra'ilacya santatice vidvanahi janatata
Ani jara amhi yala (arabi bhase'aivaji) an'ya ekhadya bhasecya vyaktivara avatarita kele asate
Tara tyane tyancyasamora yace vacana kele asate, pana yanni tyasa manale nasate
Asa prakare amhi duracari lokancya manata (inkara) dakhala kela ahe
Te joparyanta duhkhadayaka siksa- yatana (svatah) pahuna gheta nahita. To paryanta imana rakhanara nahita
Yastava to (azaba) acanaka ye'una pohocela ani tyanna tyanci kalpana (anumana) dekhila nasela
Tya veli mhanatila, kaya amhala thoda avasara (sandhi) dila ja'ila
Tara kaya he amacya siksa- yatanekarita gha'i majavita ahe
Bare, he sanga ki jara amhi tyanna varsanuvarse phayada ucalu dila
Maga tyanna to (azaba) ye'una pohocala, jya visayi tyanna bhaya dakhavale jata hote
Tara je kahi phayade tyanna pohocavile jata rahile, tyapaiki kahihi tyanna upayoga padu sakanara nahi
Ani amhi konatyahi vastila nasta kele nahi, parantu asaca sthitita ki ticyasathi khabaradara karanare hote
Bodha (upadesa) cya svarupata ani amhi atyacara karanara nahi
Ani ya (kura'ana) la saitana ghe'una ale nahita
Ani na te yacya yogya aheta, na tyanna yace samarthya ahe
Kimbahuna te tara aikanyapasunahi vancita kele gele aheta
Yastava tumhi allahacya sobata dusarya ekhadya aradhya daivatala pukaru naka an'yatha tumhihi siksa prapta karanaryampaiki vhala
Ani apalya javalacya nateva'ikanna (allahace) bhaya dakhava
Ani tyancyasi naramine vaga, jo koni imanadharaka ho'una tumacya adhina ho'ila
Jara he loka tumaci avajna karatila tara tumhi ailana kara ki tumhi je kahi karita ahata mi tyapasuna alipta ahe
Ani apala purna bharosa tyavara rakha jo varcasvasali, dayavana ahe
Jo tumhala pahata asato, jevha tumhi (namajasathi) ubhe rahata
Ani sajada karanaryammadhye tumace hindane phiranehi
Nihsansaya to (allaha) motha aikanara ani motha jananara ahe
Kaya mi tumhala sangu ki saitana konavara utaratata
Te pratyeka khotya, duracarivara utaratata
Te (varavara) aikaleli gosta pohacavitata ani tyancyapaiki bahuteka khote aheta
Ani kavince anusarana teca loka karatata, je pathabhrasta asaveta
Kaya tumhi nahi pahile ki kavi dari - darita doke apatata phiratata
Ani te je mhanatata te karata nahita

Tyancyakherija jyanni imana rakhale ani satkarme kelita ani mothya sankhyene allahaci prasansa (namahsmarana) karita rahile ani apana atyacarapidita asalyanantara suda ghetala, ani jyanni atyacara kela ahe te dekhila lavakaraca januna ghetila ki konatya kusivara ulatatata
Ta - sina ya ayati aheta kura'anacya (arthata spasta) ani divya granthacya
Margadarsana ani khusakhabara, imana rakhanaryankarita
Je namaja kayama karatata ani jakata ada karatata ani akhiratavara imana rakhatata
Je loka kayamatavara imana rakhata nahi, amhi tyancyasathi tyanci karme susobhita karuna dakhavili aheta, yastava te bhatakata phiratata
Heca te loka hota, jyancyasathi mothi va'ita siksa- yatana ahe, ani akhiratamadhyehi te mothe nukasana ucalanare aheta
Ani nihsansaya tumhala kura'ana sikavila jata ahe, hikamatasali ani sarvakahi jananarya allahatarphe

Jevha musa apalya kutumbiyanna mhanale, mi aga pahili ahe. Mi tethuna eka tara kahi batami ghe'una ye'ina kinva agica ekhada dhagadhagata vistava ghe'una lageca tumacyajavala ye'ina, yasathi ki tumhi sekuna ghyave
Jevha tithe pohocale tevha tyanna haka dili geli ki subha ahe to, jo tya agita ahe ani subha ahe to jo ticyajavala pasa ahe ani motha pavitra ahe allaha, sarva visvanca svami va palanakarta
Musa (aika) khari gosta hi ki mica allaha ahe jabaradasta ani hikamata (bud'dhikausalya) balaganara

Ani tumhi apali kathi khali taka. (Hajarata musa yanni) jevha tila halacala karatana pahile asa prakare ki janu sapa ahe, tevha tonda phiravuna patha valavuna palale ani mage valunahi pahile nahi. He musa! Bhi'u naka. Majhyasamora paigambara bhita nasatata
Parantu je loka atyacara karatila, maga tyasa neki (satkarma) ne badalatila tya duracaranantara tara mi dekhila mapha karanara, daya karanara ahe

Ani apala hata apalya galapattita taka to subhra (ani tejasvi) ho'una nighela, kasalyahi vyadhivina. (Tumhi) na'u nisanya ghe'una phira'auna ani tyacya anuyayinjavala (ja) nihsansaya to duracari lokanca samuha ahe
Yastava, jevha tyancyajavala dole ughadavinare amace camatkara (mojije) pohocale, tevha te mhanu lagale ki hi tara ughada jadu ahe
Ani tyanni inkara kela, vastivaka tyancya manata visvasa basala hota kevala atyacara va ghamendimule (tyanni inkara kela) tara paha, tya duracari lokanca kaya sevata jhala
Ani nihsansaya, amhi da'uda ani sulemanala jnana pradana kele hote ani doghe mhanale, sarva prasansa tya allahakarita ahe, jyane amhala apalya aneka imanadharaka dasanvara sresthatva pradana kele ahe
Ani da'udace varasa sulemana jhale ani mhanale, lokanno! Amhala paksyanci boli (bhasa) sikivali geli ahe. Ani amhala sarva kahi dile gele ahee. Nihsansaya ha (allahaca) motha ughada upakara ahe
Ani sulemanacya samora tyance sarva sain'ya jinna ani manusya ani paksi jama kele gele (pratyeka prakarala) vegavegale ubhe kele gele
Jevha te mungyancya maidanata pohocale, tevha eka mungi mhanali, he mungyano! Apapalya bilata patakana ghusa (ase na vhave ki) asavadhanimule sulemana ani tyancya sain'yane tumhala payakhali tudavave

Ticya ya bolanyavara (hajarata sulemana) yanni smitahasya kele ani du'a (prarthana) karu lagale ki he majhya palanakartya! Tu mala tauphika (subud'dhi) pradana kara ki mi tujhya ya denagyambaddala krtajnata vyakta karavi, jya tu majhyavara kelya aheta ani majhya mata-pityanvara ani mi asi satkarme karita rahave, jyamule tu prasanna rahave ani mala apalya daya- krpene apalya neka- sadacari dasammadhye samila kara
Ani tyanni paksyance niriksana kele va mhanale, kaya gosta ahe ki mala huda huda disuna yeta nahi? Kaya kharokhara to hajara nahi
Nihsansaya mi tyala kathora danda de'ina kinva tyala kapuna takina kinva tyane majhyasamora yogya karana sadara karave
Kahi jasta vela jhala navhata, tevadhyata to (ye'una) mhanala, mi asa gostici khabara anali ahe ki jyavisayi tumhi janataca nahi. Mi ‘saba’ci agadi visvasaniya batami ghe'una tumacyajavala alo ahe
Mi pahile ki eka stri tyancyavara rajya karita ahe, jila sarva prakaracya vastumpaiki kahi na kahi pradana kele gele ahe ani tice sinhasana dekhila mothe bhavya ahe

Mi tila ani ticya janasamuhacya lokanna allaha'aivaji suryala sajada karatana pahile. Saitanane tyaci karme tyanna bhale cangale asalyace dakhavuna satya margapasuna tyanna rokhale ahe, yastava tyanna sanmarga prapta hota nahi
Ki kevala tyaca allahala sajada karava, jo akasancya ani dharaticya lapalelya vastunna bahera kadhato, ani je kahi tumhi lapavuna thevata ani jahira karata to te sarva kahi janato
(Arthata) allaha! Tyacyakherija konihi upasaniya nahi. Toca mahana arsa (isa-sinhasanam) ca svami ahe
(Sulemana) mhanale, ata amhi pahato ki tu khare bolalasa ki tu khota ahe
Majhe he patra ne'una tyanna de, maga tyancyapasuna dura ho'una paha ki te kaya uttara detata
Ti mhanali, he saradaranno! Majhyajavala eka mahattvapurna patra takale gele ahe
Je sulemanatarphe ahe ani jyaca arambha atisaya dayavana, mothya meharabana allahacya navane ahe
He ki tumhi majhyasamora vidroha karu naka ani muslima ho'una majhyajavala ya
Ti (rani) mhanali, he majhya darabari lokanno! Tumhi majhya ya samasyebabata mala salla dya. Mi konatyahi gostica antima phaisala, joparyanta tumaci upisthati ani mata nasela, karata nasate
Tya sarvanni uttara dile, amhi mothe majabuta ani saktisali ani khupa ladhavayye ahota. Ata yapudhe tumaca adhikara ahe. Tumhi svatahca vicara kara ki tumhi amhala konata adesa deta

Ti (rani) mhanali, badasaha (raje-maharaje) jevha ekhadya vastita pravesa karatata, tevha tila osada karuna takatata ani tithalya pratisthita lokanna apamanita karatata tevha loka dekhila aseca karatila
Ani mi tyanna eka najarana pathavinara ahe, maga pahate ki duta kaya uttara ghe'una parata yetata

Yastava (rajaduta) jevha (hajarata) sulemanajavala pohocala, tevha sulemana mhanale, kaya tumhi loka dhana de'una majhi madata karu icchita? Mala tara majhya palanakartyane yahuna khupa jasta de'una thevale ahe, je tyane tumhala dile ahe. Tevha apalya najaranyane tumhica khusa raha
Ja, parata ja, tyancyakade amhi tyancyavara ase sain'ya pathavu ki jyaca samana karanyaci tyancyata takata nahi ani amhi tyanna apamanita va parabhuta karuna tithuna bahera ghalavu
(Sulemana) mhanale, he saradaranno! Tumacyapaiki koni asa ahe, jo tyance muslima ho'una pohacanyapurvica, tice sinhasana majhyajavala anuna de'ila
Eka baladhya jinna mhanala, tumhi apalya jagevaruna uthanyapurvica mi te tumacyajavala anato. Visvasa rakha, mi yace samarthya rakhato. Ani mi amanatadara (visvasta) hi ahe

Jyacyajavala granthace jnana hote, to mhanale, ki tumaci papani lavanyapurvica mi tyasa tumacyajavala pohacavu sakato. Jevha paigambara (sulemana) ne te (sinhasana) apalyajavala hajara asalele pahile, tevha mhanale, ha majhya palanakartyaca upakara ahe. Yasathi ki tyane majhi kasoti ghyavi ki mi krtajnata darsavito ki krtaghnata. Krtajnata vyakta karanara apalya phayadyasathica krtajnata vyakta karato. Ani jo krtaghnata darsavila tara majha palanakarta motha nihsprha ani motha meherabana ahe
(Hajarata sulemanane) adesa dila ki ranicya sinhasanace svarupa kahise badaluna taka. Maga pahu ya, ti margadarsana prapta karate ki tya lokampaiki tharate je margadarsana prapta karita nahi
Maga jevha ti hajara jhali tevha tila vicarale gele ki tumace sinhasana aseca ahe? Tine uttara dile, he janu teca ahe amhala yacyapurvica jnana dile gele hote ani amhi muslima hoto
Ani tila tyanni rokhuna thevale hote, jyanci ti allahakherija upasana karita rahili, nihsansaya ti kaphira lokampaiki hoti

Tila sangitale gele ki mahalata pravesa kara. Jevha tine pahile tevha tila ase vatale ki ha jalasaya (hauda) ahe, tine apalya potarya ughadya kelya (sulemana) mhanale, ha tara kaceca banalela ahe. Ti mhanali, he majhya palanakartya! Mi apalya pranavara atyacara kela. Ata mi sulemanasobata, sarva visvancya palanakartya allahaci ajnadharaka banate
Ani nihsansaya, amhi ‘samuda’kade tyanca bha'u ‘svaleha’la pathavile (ya sandesasaha) ki tumhi sarva allahaci upasana kara. Tarihi te dona gata banuna apasata bhandanatanta karu lagale

(Paigambara svaleha) mhanale, he majhya janasamuhacya lokanno! Tumhi bhalepanacya adi va'ita gostici gha'i ka majavita ahata. Tumhi allahajavala maphi ka nahi magata? Yasathi ki tumacyavara daya keli javi
(Te) mhanale ki amhi tara tumhala ani tumacya sathidaranna apasakuni samajato (paigambarani) uttara dile, tumaca apasakuna allahajavala ahe. Kimbahuna tumhi tara kasotita padalele loka ahata
Ya saharata na'u (pramukha) manase hoti, je dharatita utpata (phasada) pasaravita hote ani sudharanece kama karita navhate

Tyanni apasata allahaci sapatha ghe'una pratijna keli ki ratritunaca ‘svaleha’ ani tyancya kutumbiyanvara halla cadhavu ani tyancya varasadarala sangu ki amhi tyancya kutumbacya hatyecya veli hajara navhato ani amhi khare bolata ahota
Ani tyanni dava khela ani amhi dekhila ani te tyasa samajataca navhate
Ata paha, tyancya kata-karasthanaca kaya parinama jhala? Amhi tyanna ani tyancya janasamuhala, sarvannaca nasta karuna takale
Hi tyanci ghare aheta, ji tyancya atyacaramule osada padali aheta. Je loka jnana balagatata, tyancyasathi tyata mothi nisani ahe
Ani amhi tyanna, jyanni imana rakhale hote ani je satkarma karita hote, purnapane vacavile
Ani lutaca (ullekha kara) jevha te apalya janasamuhala mhanale, ki janunabujunahi tumhi kukarma (purusa sahavasa) karata
Hi kaya gosta ahe? Ki tumhi striyanna soduna purusanjavala kamavasanapurtisathi yeta? Khari gosti asi ki tumhi mothe ajnana purna kama karita ahata
